title: AutoBrainlift
description: AI-powered documentation system that automatically generates and maintains project insights from codebase analysis.
longDescription: Built to solve my own problem of forgetting project details. AutoBrainlift analyzes codebases, generates summaries, and maintains living documentation that stays current with development.

title: Enterprise-Grade Legacy Code Integration
description: Production-grade bespoke workflow automation platform handling complex research processes with real-time monitoring and auditing.
longDescription: Designed for research teams needing reliable automation and bespoke workflows. Handles multi-step workflows, integrates with legacy systems, and provides real-time visibility into process bottlenecks.

title: AI Code Reviewer
description: Intelligent code review assistant that provides contextual feedback and catches issues before they reach production.
longDescription: Personal tool that became team standard. Reviews PRs for logic errors, performance issues, and maintainability concerns while learning from team preferences.

title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
description: High-performance dashboard processing live data streams with sub-second latency and interactive visualizations.
longDescription: Built for monitoring critical business metrics. Handles massive data streams, provides interactive charts, and alerts teams when thresholds are breached.

title: Smart Deployment Pipeline
description: Intelligent CI/CD system that optimizes deployments, predicts failures, and automatically rolls back problematic releases.
longDescription: Tired of deployment anxiety, I built this to make releases boring. It learns from deployment patterns, predicts potential issues, and handles rollbacks automatically.
